member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the Shipping class

member.summary: Shipping type. See the ShippingType helper class for a list of known shipping types.

member.name: P:Uol.PagSeguro.Shipping.Cost
member.summary: Total shipping cost. This is a read-only property and it is calculated by PagSeguro based on the shipping information provided with the payment request.

member.name: M:Uol.PagSeguro.TransactionSearchService.SearchByDateCore(Uol.PagSeguro.Credentials,System.DateTime,System.DateTime,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Common implmentation of all SearchByDate methods
member.param: End of date range. Use DateTime.MaxValue to search without an upper boundary.
Page number, starting with 1. If passed as 0, it will call the web service to get the default page, also page number 1.

member.name: T:Uol.PagSeguro.ShippingType
member.summary: Defines a list of known shipping types.

member.name: M:Uol.PagSeguro.PaymentRequest.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the PaymentRequest class

member.name: M:Uol.PagSeguro.PaymentRequest.Register(Uol.PagSeguro.Credentials)
member.summary: Calls the PagSeguro web service and register this request for payment
member.returns: The Uri to where the user needs to be redirected to in order to complete the payment process

member.name: M:Uol.PagSeguro.PaymentRequest.ToString
member.summary: Returns a string that represents the current object

member.name: P:Uol.PagSeguro.PaymentRequest.Sender
member.summary: Party that will be sending the money

member.name: P:Uol.PagSeguro.PaymentRequest.Currency
member.remarks: The expected currency values are defined in the Currencty class.

member.name: P:Uol.PagSeguro.PaymentRequest.RedirectUri
member.summary: Uri to where the PagSeguro payment page should redirect the user after the payment information is processed.
member.remarks: Typically this is a confirmation page on your web site.

member.name: P:Uol.PagSeguro.PaymentRequest.ExtraAmount
member.summary: Extra amount to be added to the transaction total
member.remarks: This value can be used to add an extra charge to the transaction or provide a discount in the case ExtraAmount is a negative value.

member.name: P:Uol.PagSeguro.PaymentRequest.Reference
member.remarks: Optional. You can use the reference code to store an identifier so you can associate the PagSeguro transaction to a transaction in your system.

member.name: P:Uol.PagSeguro.PaymentRequest.Shipping
member.summary: Shipping information associated with this payment request

member.name: P:Uol.PagSeguro.PaymentRequest.MaxAge
member.summary: How long this payment request will remain valid, in seconds.
member.remarks: Optional. After this payment request is submitted, the payment code returned will remain valid for the period specified here.

member.name: P:Uol.PagSeguro.PaymentRequest.MaxUses
member.summary: How many times the payment redirect uri returned by the payment web service can be accessed.
member.remarks:
Optional. After this payment request is submitted, the payment redirect uri returned by the payment web service will remain valid for the number of uses specified here.
See also
